todos.title: Age
todos.body: Younger wants to be older and older wants to be younger.  Its not about what consumers are but what they want to be.

todos.title: Studio 54
todos.body: You can't sustain a great place if people can buy their way in.  Be selective about who you work with.  Everyone needs to add mutual value.  The experience needs to be proprietary.

todos.title: Central Vision
todos.body: Uniqueness doesn't evolve from design by committee, it comer from a central vision that everyone collaborates with to achieve.

todos.title: Ian Schrager
todos.body: There is no second to the market, there is only first.

todos.title: Richard Branson
todos.body: The time to go into business is when is abysmally run by others.

todos.title: Kill Cool
todos.body: The only way to stay cool is to kill yourself when you're getting hot.

todos.title: Risk
todos.body: The greatest risk is taking no risk.  Avoid don't fuck up mode (DFUM).

todos.title: Educate
todos.body: Teach people what is cool and useful.  Tell them you are the trend.

todos.title: Mission
todos.body: Stay true to your originality and mission.

todos.title: Greener Grass
todos.body: Singers want to be actors, actors want to be singers, athletes want to be rappers, rappers want to be athletes, the grass isn't always greener.

todos.title: Romance the Product
todos.body: Sell more by displaying less.  Fewer but better choices outperforms more but shittier choices.

todos.title: Urban
todos.body: People from the urban community want in, not to rebel, but to enter the consumer marketplace.

todos.title: Tomorrow
todos.body: Never create for today.  Be two steps ahead.

todos.title: Keep stepping
todos.body: Need to re-establish yourself every 3-5 years.

todos.title: Martin Puris Rule
todos.body: Looking at your neighbors backyard is a surefire way to be second best.

todos.title: Travel
todos.body: Look to see what the rest of the world is doing and how it could apply to your culture.

todos.title: Streets
todos.body: Listen to the streets but stay one step ahead.

todos.title: Step to the right
todos.body: Lead, don't follow.

todos.title: Surprise
todos.body: Keep people on the edge of their toes.

todos.title: Aesthetics
todos.body: Is not just the surface, it's the total essence from top to bottom.  Its about taking people on a journey.

todos.title: Scott Bedbury
todos.body: If you are the head of Nike Basketball you better damn know what is going on in the heads of young basketball players, what they listen too, how they talk, how they define success, what they fear, what they dream.

todos.title: Pond
todos.body: If you are a big fish in a little pond, work on growing the pond.

todos.title: John Demsey
todos.body: I love looking at trend reports because they tell me what I shouldn't be doing.  Lead, don't follow.

todos.title: David v Goliath
todos.body: Goliath is mainstream, David is edgy, be David.

todos.title: Press Strategy
todos.body: Going after press for the sake of press is a waste of time.

todos.title: Ambassadors
todos.body: Find the people that will rally behind your cause.

todos.title: Interior Cool
todos.body: Don't go outside looking for cool, look inside.

todos.title: You
todos.body: Create something you would want.

todos.title: Borrowing Trendy
todos.body: Borrow trendy words, people, things to integrate.

todos.title: Quiet
todos.body: Bigger and louder is the standard operating procedure.  Sometimes it's more noticeable to be quiet.  As noise keeps increasing, people stop listening.

todos.title: Microwave
todos.body: Anything you try to microwave will lead to microwave quality.   Everything you deliver should take time to build.

todos.title: First Impression
todos.body: Always needs to be greeted with a smile.

todos.title: Ads
todos.body: A product has to deliver the promise of its communication.
